summary: This is a modification of Caliente\'s CBBE Vanilla body mesh.
descriptionHtml:
VANILLA PLUS BODY v1_5 (CBBEv3 based)

1- DESCRIPTION

While the default (Vanilla) bodies in Skyrim are by no means bad, they\'re
composed of a low number of polygons and, as a result, they are a bit
rough. For some reason Bethesda also decided to make the frame quite
\'stocky\' with wide and flat shoulders. The weight customization offered
by Skyrim, while a much needed improvement to make NPCs a bit more
different, makes the bodies too slim in the lower part of the scale.

This mesh was done for people who want a body as close as possible to
the default mesh but with some minor improvements to make it more
pleasing to the eye. It has been built using Caliente\'s Vanilla Body mesh
as a foundation but the end result, albeit close both to Skyrim default
mesh and Caliente\'s own Vanilla Body, it\'s different in a number of ways.

The main differences in appearance with the default female body are:

-Less  stocky appearance: shoulders are a bit narrower, abdomen less
flat and prominent, back more curvy.

-No more extreme variations (especially on the lower part of the scale)
in weight; arms and legs are, by default, more robust.

-(Topless/Natural only) Breasts have a more natural look; now the shape
changes accordingly to their dimension.


2 - INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

Caliente\'s CBBEv3 body must be installed as Vanilla Plus shares the same
textures and the hand/feet meshes used by CBBE.

Any 3rd party texture MOD made for Caliente\'s CBBE body will also work.

Three different bodies are provided inside the .ZIP archive:

-Natural: nude body.
-NonNude: body is covered with the default underwear. 
-Topless: brassiere is removed but undies are retained.

The meshes for each body are stored in separate directories. Pick one
and extract/copy the files contained within: 

femalebody_0.nif
femalebody_1.nif 

from the archive to the following driectory: 

\\skyrim\\data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets

The directory already contains two files with the same name. Remember
to save them somewhere else if you want to go back to the body mesh
used before.


3 - ADDITIONAL INFO

The CBBE Body necessary to use this MOD can be downloaded from:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666


4 - VERSION HISTORY

v1.5 - Variant of v1.41

v1.41 - v1.41 - Fixed a minor clipping issue.

v1.4 - Breasts redone (almost) from scratch.

v1.3 - Minor adjustments to the tights and legs.

v1.2 - Minor adjustments to body frame and breasts.  

v1.0 - Initial release.


5 - CREDITS

Big thanks to Caliente. Without her help this little MOD wouldn\'t exist. 

CBBE rocks! :-)
author: MSxyz
